content.prompt: Line 8 (corpora . . . carina) is translated

choices.label: bodies of the wicked travel swiftly on the Stygian boat
the lively boat carries bodies of the wicked across the Styx
it is forbidden for living bodies to be transported by the Stygian boat
it is forbidden to carry living bodies in the Stygian boat

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
